scripts.build: tsc && npm run build:css && npm run copy:assets
scripts.dev: tsc & nodemon dist/app.js && concurrently "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:assets" "tsc --watch"
scripts.copy:assets: mkdir -p dist/assets && cp -R assets/* dist/assets/ && mkdir -p dist/frontend && [ -n "$(find frontend -name '*.html' 2>/dev/null)" ] && cp -R frontend/*.html dist/frontend/ || echo 'No HTML files to copy'
scripts.watch:assets: nodemon --watch assets --watch frontend --ext html,css,js,png,jpg,svg,ico --exec 'npm run copy:assets'
